鸙字的基本解释

鸙
yuè
〔天鸙〕云雀。

鸙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》以灼切，入虊，以。］
天鸙。鸟名。

鸙字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸙； 康熙笔画：28； 页码：页1504第30
【廣韻】以灼切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弋灼切，?音藥。天鸙，鳥名。形如鷃，色似鶉，卽鷚也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鷚，天鸙。

鸙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鸙字的起名意思

暂无。

Yu
yuè

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" to cut, enter the qi, to. ]
Tianxu. The name of the bird.
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸙; Kangxi strokes: 28; Page number: page 1504 30
[Guang Yun] Cut with burning [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Yi Zhuo cut, with sound medicine. Tianxu, the name of the bird. The shape is like a quail, the color is like a quail, and the pipit is also. [Erya·Shiniao] Pipit, Tianxu.
